name: Colleen Is Missing
description:
A young teen named Colleen has gone missing, reportedly last seen by a strange man. Investigate the basement and look for clues to find out what could have happened to her and possibly solve her mystery.

This is a short horror game I made for fun and my first real attempt at making something spooky. A run is around 15-30 minutes.


Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

E - Interact

Shift - Sprint
